SENT.plain: A 32-year-old female presented with aplastic anemia and subsequently underwent a one-antigen mismatched bone marrow transplant from her brother
She failed to engraft and a second graft was attempted
Protracted neutropenia of three months' duration despite the use of broad spectrum antibiotics occurred
Stenotrophomonas (Xanthomonas) maltophilia metastatic cellulitis developed that did not respond to appropriate antibiotics
